Translate the following Chinese into English:
 An automotive quarter panel is a board that is situated on the quarter of a vehicle , which is the rear portion of the car that extends from the back of the doors to the tail lamps . The quarter panel is typically constructed of sheet metal and is an important structural element of the car , helping to support the bodies and ensure stability .It additionally serves to shield and protect the rear wheel wells and the back of the car . Some cars may have a distinct quarter panel section for each side of the car , while many may have a single panel that spans both sides .In some cases , the quarter panel may be damaged in an wreck or through regular wear and tear , and may need to be replaced in order to restore the stability of the car s body .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 A torch is made of gas and grains of a fuel that are heating . When a fuel is hot to a high enough heat , it can start to burn , or ignite .This occurs because the temperature creates the molecules in the fuel to move faster and faster , until they are moving so quick that they can broke free from the remainder of the fuel and fly away into the air . These atoms are called burning products , and they are what make a fire its appearance .The form of a fire depends on a few everything , notably the kind of fuel that is smoking and the quantity of oxygen in the air . For instance , a fire from a candle is made up of a wick surrounded by a thin , cone - shaped fire .The flame is mainly made of bright gases , and it is yellow or orange in color . This is because the wick is made of a kind of gas that burns relatively slowly and cleanly , and there is enough oxygen in the air for the candle to burn brightly .On the other hand , a fire from a fire that is burning wood or other hard fuels may be much larger and less defined , with a amount of fading and movement . This is because the fuel is burning more fast and there may be less oxygen offered for the flame to burn .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 There are a few reasons why a world leader or a region might want more land : Resources : As you noted , a ruler may need more land if there are valuable resources , such as petroleum or ore , that can be extracted and sell for a revenue . This can help a society s economy and provide resources that are needed for various purposes .Strategic advantage : A leader might additionally want more land if it gives the nation a tactical advantage , such as control over key commerce routes or entry to army sites . Expansion : Some leaders or nations might want more land purely because they wish to expand their lands and increase their power and influence .This might be motivated by a desire to dominate other countries or to claim their dominance in a certain area . National unity : Some leaders or nations might want more land as a way to promote state pride or to reclaim territory that was once part of the nation but was gained due to wars or other conflicts .It s important to note that purchasing more land can often cause to conflicts with other countries and can have serious consequences , so it s not a decision that is taken lightly .

 No , it doesn t necessarily mean that someone else has to lose cash for you to make income . There are many ways that someone can make cash , and it is possible for anyone to make income without someone else gaining money .For instance , if you start a commercial and sell goods or services , you can make income by offering things that someone want or want . You are not take money away from anyone else in this instance .Instead , you are creating value to others and getting paid for it . Alternatively , you might making income by investing in shares or other financial instruments .In this instance , you might earn money if the value of your assets go up . This does not necessarily mean that someone else is losing cash , as the value of an investment can gone up for numerous different motives .It is also possible for you to make cash through gambling or other types of chance , but this is not a reliable or sustainable means to make cash over the long term . So , in short , it is easier to make cash without someone else losing cash .It is important to think about how you can provide value to others and build win - win circumstances , rather than merely take cash away from others .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 Asphalt is a kind of paving fabric that is utilized on roads , parking complexes , and other surfaces . It is made from a mixture of tiny stones , dirt , and a kind of oil called bitumen , which helps to tie the mixture together .Bitumen is a thick , soft substance that is dark in color , which is why dirt is usually colored as also . Concrete is another type of paving fabric that is made from a mixture of water , cement , and tiny stones .It is a very hard and durable substance , but it can be more cost to use than asphalt . Concrete is also not as compact as pavement , which means it can crack more easily when the soil beneath it shifts or settles .As far as the color of asphalt , white is not the only alternative . Asphalt can be made in a variety of shades , notably blue , green , and even pink .However , black is the most common color because it absorbs heat from the sun , which can help to melt dust and snow on the highway more easily in colder climates . As for the impact of the color of asphalt on the nearby area , it is true that dark - colored surfaces tend to absorb more heat from the sun than lighter - colored areas .This can make the place around an asphalt road or parking yard seem hotter , particularly on hotter days . However , the temperature absorbed by the asphalt is typically not sufficiently to significantly affect the temperature of the nearby area .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 The Holocaust was a catastrophic incident in which millions of people , mainly Jews , Romani , homosexuals , disabled people , and others deemed undesirable by the Nazi regime , were systematically killed during World War II . There is overwhelming evidence of the Holocaust , including documents , photographs , and eyewitness statements , that prove its existence and the atrocities that were done .Despite this immense evidence , some persons choose to deny that the Holocaust ever happened . They might do this for a variety of reasons , such as to promote a political or ideological agenda , to downplay the severity of the atrocities done , or to deflect blame away from those involved .It s important to remember that the Holocaust was a genuine event that had a profound and horrific effect on millions of people . Denying that it happened is not only historically inaccurate , but it also diminishes the suffering and loss of those who were impacted by it .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 If you want to register minor kids as beneficiaries of your Individual Retirement Account ( IRA ) , you will need to naming a custodian for the account . A custodian is a person who is responsible for controlling the assets of a minor until they reach the age of majority , which is typically 18 or 21 depending on federal statutes . To list a custodian for your IRA , you will need to fill out a beneficiary designation form supplied by your IRA custodian or financial institution .On the form , you will need to provide the identity , address , and place of birth of the minor child or kids you wish to name as beneficiaries . You will also need to provide the identity and contact information for the custodian you have elected to manage the account on behalf of the minor . It is important to choose a custodian carefully , as they will have considerable authority for overseeing the assets in the account .You must wish to consider naming a respected family member or friend as custodian , or you may wish to consider a career , such as an lawyer or financial consultant . It is also a helpful idea to consider your beneficiary designations with your minor kids and the custodian you have elected to ensure that everyone is conscious of and comfortable with the scheme . Finally , it is important to review and update your beneficiary designations continually to ensure that they accurately meet your current wishes .
You are a helpful assistant.

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 Polynomial regression is a kind of regression theory in which the relationship between the independent constant x and the dependent variable y is modeled as an nth degree polynomial . Polynomial regression can be used to model relationships between parameters that are not linear .A polynomial regression model is a special case of a multiple linear regression model , in which the relationship between the independent variable x and the dependent variable y is modeled as an nth degree polynomial . The general form of a polynomial regression model is given by : y = b0 + b1x + b2x ^ 2 + . . . + bn * x ^ n where b0 , b1 , . . . , bn are the coefficients of the polynomial , and x is the independent variable .The degree of the polynomial ( i . e . , the value of n ) determines the flexibility of the model . A higher degree polynomial can represent more complex relationships between z and y , but it can also lead to overfitting if the model is not well - tuned .To match a polynomial regression model , you need to choose the degree of the polynomial and estimate the coefficients of the polynomial . This can be performed using conventional linear regression techniques , such as ordinary least squares ( OLS ) or gradient descent .Polynomial regression is convenient for modeling relationships between parameters that are not linear . It can be used to fitting a curve to a setting of data points and making predictions about future values of the dependent variable based on new values of the independent constant .It is often employed in areas such as engineering , economics , and finance , where there may be complex relationships between parameters that are not well modeled using linear regression .
You are a helpful assistant.

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 Forgiving anybody s creditors would be a very difficult and difficult process , and it would not have the intended impacts . If everyone s creditors were forgiven , it could lead to inflation , which is when the value of money goes down .This might help it difficult for people to buy essential things like meals and housing . Furthermore , forgiving loans might not be fair to individuals who have worked difficult to pay off their debts and live responsibly .It might also discourage people from being liable with their money in the future , because they may know that their debts could potentially be forgiven . It s important to find ways to assist individuals who are struggling with credit , but forgiving all creditors is not a simple answer and could have unintended consequences .Instead , there are other ways that municipalities and agencies can provide help and help to individuals who are struggling with loan , such as through financial training and counseling , debt consolidation , or reorganization protections .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 In Gnucash , you can collect individual expenses from family income by using accounts . Here are the steps you can take to do this : Create a new account for each individual in your household .You can do this by go to the Accounts menu and choosing New Account . Choose the appropriate account type ( e . g . , Expense , Asset , Liability ) and enter the identity of the person as the account name . Set up a parent account for your household expenses .This can be an Expense or Asset account , depending on the kind of expenses you are tracking . Name the account Family Expenses or something identical . Set up sub - deposits under the parent account for each category of family expense .For instance , you might have sub - accounts for groceries , utilities , and recreation . When you make a family expense , record it in the appropriate sub - account under the Family Expenses parent account . For instance , if you buy groceries , you might record the transaction in the Groceries sub - account . When an individual in your household makes a personal expense , record it in their individual account .For instance , if one clan member buys a new clothes , you might record the transaction in their individual Expense account . By using this account structure , you can easily record and separate personal finances from family expenditure in Gnucash .
You are a helpful assistant.

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 There are a few reasons why some toll road booths don t offer card cards . First , it can be expensive for the toll road owner to install and maintain payment card transaction devices .These machines must to be connected to the online or a phone line in order to document the transactions , and they also need to be regularly serviced and replaced . This can add up to a lot of money over time .Second , some toll road providers must not wish to pay the fees that come with accepting credit tickets . When you use a credit ticket to pay for something , the credit card firm costs the merchant ( in this instance , the toll road owner ) a fraction of the purchase price as a fee .This tax can be considerable , particularly if a lot of people use credit books to pay the tolls . Finally , some toll road providers sometimes merely not see the necessity to take payment cards .If most people who use the toll road are paying with cash or a toll pass , it could not work sense for the operator to invest in credit ticket pay systems . Overall , there are a plenty of considerations that can influence whether or not a toll road booth accepts credit tickets .Some toll road providers must select to take payment cards in order to make it better for customers to pay , while others may choose not to take them due to the cost and hassle associated .

Many Tibetans see him as a symbol of their culture and way of life .The Chinese administration , however , does not like the Dalai Lama because they believe that he is trying to separate Tibet from China and making it an free region . Translate the following Chinese into English:
 Google AdWords and Google Ads are ads platforms that enable customers to place ads on Google and its advertising system . The main change between the two is that AdWords is a pay - per - click ( PPC ) advertising system , which means that businesses only pay when person clicks on their ad , while Google Ads is a more general advertising technology that contains PPC advertising as well as other types of advertising such as display advertising and video advertising .Here s a simple example to assist explain the difference : Imagine you own a bakery and you want to advertise your delicious baking internet . You could employ Google AdWords to create an ad that appears when person searches for best cookies in town on Google .When anyone saw your ad and clicks on it , they will be taken to your website , and you will be charged a small fee . On the other hand , if you wanted to use Google Ads to advertise your cookies , you might generate an ad that appears on other websites that are part of Google s advertising system .For instance , your ad might appear on a food blog that someone is reading , or it could occur as a banner ad at the front of a blog . In this instance , you might be charged according on how many times your ad is displayed ( impressions ) or how many times it is clicked ( clicks ) .Both AdWords and Google Ads can be valuable for businesses wanting to advertise online , but the selection between the two will depend on your different ads goals and expenditure .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 It is typically a good idea to slowly shift your financial to a new bank union if you are intending on application for a credit ticket with that credit union . This is because the credit union will probably consider your financial history with them when deciding whether to approve your credit ticket applying .Additionally , moving all of your financial at once can be time - consuming and may create disruptions to your finances . Here are some steps you can take to slowly shift your credit to a new loan association : Research debt unions : Look for bank unions that provide bank cards and compare their charges , interest rates , and other terms and conditions . Open a checking account : begin by closing a checking account with the credit union . This will let you to collect your paychecks and pay bills immediately from the account . Set up automatic pays : Consider setting up automatic bills for your bills , such as your rent or mortgage , utilities , and other recurring expenses .This will assist guarantee that you don t miss any payments while you are transitioning your banking . Transfer your direct deposit : If you receive your paycheck via direct deposit , call your employer to redirect your deposit to your new credit union account . Close your old accounts : Once you felt comfortable using your new bank union account and have shifted all of your automatic transactions and direct deposits , you can close your old accounts . Make careful to skip any automatic transactions or direct deposits that are still go to your old account . By following these actions , you can smoothly transition your financial to a new credit union and be in a better situation to apply for a credit card with them .

 Musicians and bands often use Persian rugs in their recording studios or on stage because they can help to absorb music and reduce echoes . This can make the music more obvious and improve the overall performance of the music .When sound particles fall through the air , they can drop off of hard surfaces like walls , ceilings , and ceilings . This can create echoes , which can make the audio feel less distinct and less professional .Persian rugs are making of deep , plush materials that can reflect sound signals and reduce the quantity of echo in a room . By laying down a Persian rug in a studio studio or on stage , musicians and bands can help to create a better music atmosphere that enables them to produce high - grade recordings or performances .The using of Persian rugs is just one of several methods that musicians and sound designers employ to achieve the best possible music level .

Subscription costs : Some TV series are only available to watch if you pay a monthly premium fee to a service like Netflix or Hulu .The TV show gets a portion of this amount . Licensing and syndication : A TV show can also make income by buying the rights to watch the program to other countries or to other TV networks .This is called licensing or syndication . Merchandise : television shows can also make income by buying clothing based on the program , like t - shirts or accessories .As for how customers making a show like Game of Thrones money , it s mostly through the ways mentioned above . When you watch Game of Thrones on HBO , for example , you might see advertisements during the program , and HBO pays a subscription charge to watch its programming .Game of Thrones generally receives profit through licensing and syndication , as also as through the selling of merchandise .

Furthermore , artwork can be saw as a prestige symbol , and some person are able to pay a lot of money to show off their wealth or taste .Finally , artwork can be a positive asset , and people may be willing to pay a lot of money for artworks that they believe will expand in value over time .

Once the light force has been caught , it can be used to create images that have a greater sense of clarity and dimensionality , as well as to produce images that can be viewed from varying angles .Light field tech is already relatively new , and it is being continuously researched and developed in the field of digital graphics and computer vision . There are a few reasons why the people may offer taxation cuts to the wealthy .One reason is that the state hopes that if the wealthy have more capital , they will spend it in ways that will create jobs and help the economy grow . This might include starting new industries , increasing old ones , or investing in things like companies and real property . Another reason is that the state would want to promote certain types of actions , such as saving and investing , by giving tax breaks to individuals who do those things .For instance , the government might give a tax break to person who invests in a retirement account , because saving for retirement is seen as a better thing that helps people be financially secure when they are age . It s also could that the state offers taxation cuts to the wealthy because they have more social power and are better able to campaign for positive policies . Overall , the idea behind giving tax cutting to the wealthy is that it will have a positive effect on the economy and society as a whole .  Fast food restaurants are often found next to each other because it can be a better location for both businesses . When fast food restaurants are situated close to each other , they can draw a greater number of customers because someone may be more likely to stopping at a restaurant if they saw numerous options in the same region .Additionally , being located near other fast food restaurants can make it better for the businesses to exchange resources , such as car lots and delivery services . Translate the following Chinese into English:
 Rogue waves , sometimes called as freak waves or creature waves , are big , unexpected currents that can occur on the surface of the ocean . They are much bigger and more strong than the nearby waves , and can represent a major danger to boats and offshore systems .There are several variables that can affect to the formation of rogue waves . One of the main factors is the interaction of waves with each other .When waves meet and overlap , they can create a new signal that is bigger and more potent than the individual currents that created it . This is known as constructive interference .Another factor that can affect to the formation of rogue waves is the presence of high currents or wind . When winds are powerful and steady , they can cause waves to expand in height and intensity .Similarly , large waves can cause waves to expand and become more strong . Finally , rogue waves can also be caused by waves , particularly when storms are produced by intense winds over a large area for an extended period of time .These waves can travel wide distances and grow in height , ultimately became rogue waves when they reach shallow oceans near the coast . It is worth note that rogue waves are fairly scarce and do not occur with normal frequency .However , they can be deadly and have the potential to create severe injury to boats and offshore systems .
You are a helpful assistant.

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 It s generally a good idea to start saving money as shortly as you can , even if it s just a small amount . The earlier you start saving , the more space your money has to expand through the power of compound interest .This implies that the money you make can develop and produce much more dollars , which can help you reach your financial goals better . There is no specific age at which you should cease saving money . It s important to keep saving and developing a financial cushion throughout your life to plan for the surprising and to assist you attain your financial goals . That being said , it s also important to consider your current economic circumstances and ensure sure that you are saving enough to meet your long - term and long - term financial demands .This might involve setting different financial goals , such as saving for a down payment on a house , saving for retirement , or construction an emergency fund to pay sudden expenses . Ultimately , the key is to finish saving as early as possible and to keep saving continuously throughout your life to ensure that you have the monetary assets you need to meet your financial goals and prepare for the future .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 In the United States , businesses are often classified as law persons for the purpose of having civil rights and obligations . This implies that they can engage into agreements , sue and be prosecuted , and own property , just like an individual person .One reason that businesses may be treated as law persons is to make it better for them to do business and interact with the legal system . For instance , if a corporation wants to enter into a agreement with another party , it can do so as a law individual rather than requiring all of the personal shares ( buyers ) of the corporation to sign the deal .This can make it more efficient and useful for companies to engage in business activities . Another reason that businesses may be treated as law persons is to hold them accountable for their actions .If a corporation engages in wrongdoing , it can be prosecuted in a court of law just like an individual person . This helps to ensure that businesses take responsibility for their actions and do not harm individuals or the community .Overall , treating corporations as law persons helps them to more easily engage in business and be kept accountable for their actions , which can help to promote fairness and peace in society .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 The Family and Medical Leave Act ( FMLA ) is a federal law that offers certain staff with up to 12 weeks of unpaid , employment - protected leave per decade for specific parents and medical reasons , including : The adoption , adoption , or foster care placement of a baby The caring of a wife , child , or mother who has a major health condition A bad health condition that making the worker difficult to complete their job To be eligible for FMLA leave , an worker must have worked for their employer for at least 12 months , have worked at least 1 , 250 hours over the previous 12 months , and work at a location where the company produces at least 50 employees within 75 kilometers . The FMLA requires that the employer continue to provide medical insurance for the worker during the leave term , and that the worker be allowed to remain to the same or an comparable employment upon their return from departure .The FMLA applicable to all public organizations , including local , state , and federal employers , as well as private sector companies who employ 50 or more employees .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 When a can of compressed vapor is utilized , the gas inside is released and permitted to expand . As the gas expands , it cools down .This is because the process of increasing the gas involves the gas molecules to do work , and when molecules do work , they losing power . The losing of electricity is manifested as a drop in heat . Think of it like breaking up a balloon .When you blow up a balloon , you have to do work by exhaling air into the balloon . As you do this , you might see that your breath gets warmer .This is because the process of exhaling the air into the balloon involves your bodies to do work , and when your bodies does work , it releases energy in the form of warmth . Now , imagine that instead of exhaling air into a balloon , you were exhaling air into a can . As the can got empty with more and more water , the pressure inside the can would rise .When you open the can to let the air out , the pressure inside the can would change , forcing the air to expand and cool down . This is analogous to what happens when you use a can of compressed air . I pray this helps to explain why cans of compressed gasoline get cool when you let the air out .Let me know if you have any other concerns !

The gold is not used as money , but it is regarded a precious property that can be used to back the value of the U . S . currency .In the previous , the U . S . economy and the stability of the credit structure . Even though the U . S . no longer employs the silver standard , the state nevertheless holds a large amount of gold , and it is stored at Fort Knox for safekeeping .The gold is not utilized for daily trades , but it is regarded a precious commodity that can be used in times of economic crisis or other emergencies .

Translate the following Chinese into English:
 The U . S . debt does matter , but it s still vital to realize that a certain level of debt is normal and even necessary for organizations . When a government taking on loan , it is borrowing funds to finance numerous initiatives and projects .This can be beneficial because it allows the president to participate in things that can improve the nation and its citizens , such as roads , school , and hospitals . However , if a government taking on too big deficit , it can form a problem . This is because the nation will have to pay return the money it loaned , plus interest .If the state is unable to pay forward its debt , it can lead to economic problems for the nation and its citizens . It s also worth note that the U . S . government is allowed to lend cash at very low interest rates , which helps to keep the cost of servicing the loan manageable . However , if companies fail trust in the state s capabilities to pay forward its debt , they may demand higher interest rates , which potentially make it more cost for the nation to lend cash in the future . Translate the following Chinese into English:
 A bug in a computer program or video game is an mistake or flaw that causes it to not work properly . Bugs can cause a software to crash , freeze , or behave suddenly .They can also stop a system from conducting particular duties or operations . Bugs exist for a variety of reasons .Sometimes , they are the result of mistakes done by the people who built the code for the program . Other times , they are created by changes in the operating program or other software that the program rely on .Sometimes , bugs are created by hardware issues , like a problem with the computer s memory or processor . It s important to repair problems as they are found , because they can cause difficulties for users and making the program fewer fun to use .Programmers and makers fight hard to find and fix bugs , but it s not always easy to caught them all . That s why it s not rare for applications and games to have some bugs , particularly after they have been released .
